system.description:
Used to determine success/quality when producing commonplace metallic goods. This skill may not be used to produce jewelry, weapons, or armour. Specialties are based on types of metal: copper, iron/steel, bronze, brass, pewter, lead, tin, etc. Metalcrafters (mostly blacksmiths) are found in most settlements.

Metalcraft is averaged with Lockcraft to construct locks, secret compartments, and other small, complex, and/or delicate mechanisms. Larger machinery is usually built by millwrights (engineers).
